benefits.title: Auction Access

benefits.title: History Reports
benefits.description: We include AutoCheck reports to verify vehicle history.

benefits.title: Bidding Strategy
benefits.description: We advise you on the recommended maximum price based on historical data.

faqs.question: What happens after requesting advice?
faqs.answer: An expert will contact you via WhatsApp to review the vehicles and coordinate the deposit.

faqs.question: Is the advisory fee refundable?
faqs.answer: The advisory fee remains as credit if you don't win the auction, so you can try with another vehicle.
